reviewText: The Hunted Lady is a fine 1977 television film that starred Donna Mills. I enjoyed seeing her play a policewoman  on television. Donna Mills fans will like it the most.

Found movie at a pawn shop, watched and enjoyed it.  I was hoping to find other episodes of this movie because of the way it ended .... she is still on the run, looking for evidence to clear her name.  Does anyone know if other movies were made regarding the "Hunted Lady?"
